Actions.Text: AMEND (T) AND RECOMMIT TO LOCAL GOVERNMENTS

Title: Authorizes the town of Pavilion in Genesee county to share and hold justice court in the town of Covington in Wyoming county
Summary: Authorizes the town of Pavilion in Genesee county to share and hold justice court in the town of Covington in Wyoming county.
ActClause: AN ACT in relation to authorizing the town of Pavilion in Genesee county to share and hold justice court in the town of Covington in Wyoming county
